meanings.definition: A type of Icelandic dairy product similar to yogurt.
meanings.sent1: I tried the delicious skyrs for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: She bought a tub of skyrs from the store.
meanings.sent3: The skyrs jumped out of the fridge and started dancing.
meanings.sent4: The creamy skyrs was a cloud of happiness in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The tangy flavor of skyrs lingered on my taste buds.

meanings.definition: To strain or pour off liquid from yogurt to thicken it.
meanings.sent1: She carefully skyrs the yogurt to make it thicker.
meanings.sent2: He always skyrs the yogurt before eating it.
meanings.sent3: The yogurt decided to skyrs itself to impress the other dairy products.
meanings.sent4: The chef's skillful hands skyrsed the yogurt with precision.
meanings.sent5: The kitchen was filled with the sound of yogurt being skyrsed.
